about_the_game:
INTRODUCTION


Crimson Spirit is an auto scrolling arcady platformer with a twist: instead of jumping you turn around a branch! Collect orb and dodge traps to reach the end each level!

Embody a spirit of nature and restore your forest to its former self! Your mother tree is on the brink of death, and her pain is a tremendous danger to your forest.

To save it, you'll need to collect the soul of the forest that scatter along its corrupted roots. Be careful; it is also your source of energy, so the more you miss it, the slower you will be, and in the long term, you too will disappear.

Will you be able to collect as many life orbs of souls as possible in order to bring the forest back to a state of peace and balance, or will you disappear with the rest of your forest trying?

FEATURES


  • EXPLORE the dying forest by moving around the elder trees root !

  • RECOVER all the souls of the forest and try to 100% the game, or vibe along the root while playing !

  • DODGE the traps left by the corruption !

  • SAVE The Forest !
